Title: Successful Credit Card Payment JSON
Preconditions: User has items in cart. User is at checkout payment step.
Steps: Enter valid CC details. Submit payment.

Title: Failed Payment - Insufficient Funds JSON
Preconditions: User has items in cart. User is at checkout payment step.
Steps: Enter CC details for an account with insufficient funds. Submit payment.
Expected Results: Payment failed message. 'Insufficient funds' reason displayed.
